Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 25th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2009...
Injured on 5/10/2009 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/14/2010 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/9/2011, off Brian Lawrence (SDN)...
Earned first career win on 4/9/2011...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/2012, off Josh Collmenter (NYN)...
Was selected to the 2012 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with San Francisco in 2012...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2019, going 3-2, 1.20...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young Award in 2019, going 25-10, 2.70 ERA...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/6/2021 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
